Sorry for taking so long to reply, had to write an essay for English homework.

@Spartwo

Hah! I wondered if that was possible!

@Camulus777

You said you had a joystick in the video!? Also, yeah, I see the family resemblance .

i borrowed a friends for the video to see if it was worth buying one.

I can see the appeal for multilayer battles but that will make stock combat impossible unless you use the weapons mods. KSP stock weapons are to inaccurate to it moving targets with any degree of effectiveness. Also if you are using the laser weapons mods it will be to op leaving the terrible sparrow missiles the pirates weapons mod and the auto cannons.

Can i battle someone!!!! Please, im bored

Its 2 different things from TF2.
And same as War Eagle. My computer almost blows up while doing KSP. I dont think it can handly it but i might try and see.

corgi, I will fight you if you want. I wont use the multiplayer mods though, simply because I cant. Set up the persistence file, and when I get home I will set up with my Burai's and Icaruga's, and take a turn, then send you the persist back.

So. where are we fighting? Vall? Gilly? Interstellar Space?

Kerbin, as this is mostly a plane and missile thing. I have mods installed but my save wont have any active ships with mod parts that might ruin your thing. And I accept.

Persistence and objective coming soon.
